channel.title: [Battlescape] Emps-Pkz - High Stable, Npc Clipping, HD NPC Models + lots more!
channel.description:
This server is very amazing. All skill cape emotes working. It is supposed to look like emps-scape. The ::maxhit command works too. Next Release i will add a healer. I will add blades too. It has custom whips like orange barrow. Party hats give str xp. The soruce means you can make your own server just like emps-scape. This server is extreamley stable and hardly has any bugs.
If you want more information like download links and pictures watch this: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B2hqaz2sIEs

item.title: [Battlescape] Emps-Pkz - High Stable, Npc Clipping, HD NPC Models + lots more!
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

hawkgames:

YE WOULD REP U IF I COULD PERSON ON TOP OF ME

CAPS don’t make you look cool, don’t use them unless needed.

JlStepper:

I LIKE HOW WE NEED TO COMPLETE SURVEYS TO DOWNLOAD THIS SHIT.

Just leave.

revenge21:

video is not to bad but the links he has chosen suck…

Then ask for a download link to a real upload site, not some shitty site that pays the person for downloads.

…

Don’t spam.

imsokool22:

vid must be boring then…>.<

Don’t post if you didn’t watch the video.

darkangel996:

tbh i start daydreaming while watching the vid and i don’t daydream.

Cool.

[quote=“Fridder, post:3, topic:361678”]*Post Pictures
*Post the client download link
*Post the source download link
*I dont trust junior members with 9 rep, either
*Give more information[/quote]

*Pictures are not mandatory.
*If there isn’t a download link then report the topic.
*Don’t use a persons post title and rep number to judge them, they both mean nothing.
*“Give more information” - Yes please add more information.

imsokool22:

please post the links on here. using a youtube video with download link is NOT what the download section is for.Please repost links on here and you can keep the youtube video.

As you can see the person didn’t listen, you should of just reported the topic so a mod can tell him or her.

Please, add a download link to the source and client, using a youtube video can be considered advertising, also you have to add credits to all the people who have worked on the server.

Read full topic
